name: Space Wars 3000 super delux edition
description:
The game was made as a part of Game Development course at XAMK Finland University of Applied Sciences Description

Space Wars 3000 super delux edition is a space shooter game highly inspired by Born to Be Rebellious [Quick Transmigration], "Junk Star" arch.

Destroy enemy ships, collect boosts dropped by them and try to survive in the dead space! Try to save your bullets since the space soesn't forgive the loff of resourses. And never forget, there is always bigger fish in the sea...

Controllers

<-  to move ->

LMB to shoot

RMB to use special attack

Developers Game Design: Vesna GrauUI: Vesna Grau
Art: Vesna Grau
Code: Vesna Grau
